trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> modes within the property grid .
trans-unit.target: Representa um botão que permite que o usuário alterne entre os diferentes modos <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> dentro da grade de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines what type of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode" /> to display upon receipt of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Determina que tipo de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode" /> exibir no recebimento de um evento <see cref="T:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty" /> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> and if that is <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, sets up the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> to be the mode to switch to.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty" /> alterou (ou ganhou ou perdeu) seu <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> de propriedade e se é <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, configura o <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> para ser o modo para o qual mudar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that, when <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, means that the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> will be calculated automatically to match the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que, quando <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, significa que o <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> será calculado automaticamente para corresponder ao <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> do <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o modo para o qual mudar será baseado na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> alternará automaticamente para o modo de edição do seu <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property which, when <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, means that the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> will be calculated automatically to match the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Registra a propriedade de dependência que, quando <see cref="T:System.Boolean.True" />, significa que o <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> será calculado automaticamente para corresponder ao <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode" /> do <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o modo para o qual mudar será baseado na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The edit mode to switch to when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O modo de edição para o qual mudar quando o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> for clicado.

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Registra a propriedade de dependência que obtém ou define o modo de destino quando o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton" /> é clicado.
